subject: Install problem "Class not found "junit.samples.AllTests"
msgSnippet: I ve extracted the jUnit download into C: JUnit. I ve set the CLASSPATH C: jUnit junit3.8.1 junit.jar;C: jUnit On the console I ve gone to this dir
messageBody:
I've extracted the jUnit download into C:\JUnit. I've set the CLASSPATH
"C:\jUnit\junit3.8.1\junit.jar;C:\jUnit"

On the console I've gone to this dir "C:\jUnit\junit3.8.1" and entered this

java junit.awtui.TestRunner junit.samples.AllTests

I receive this error:

"Bootstrap: infestation error: couldn't get install directory"

The TestRunner appears but an error msg is shown "Class not found
"junit.samples.AllTests"

Can you help?

Aidy
